reviews_data.review_text: Nice location downtown Pineville. I've had the Chai Latte and Macaroons, which were both really. Prices are very decent.
It was busy, but worth the wait. I loved that they had dairy free options and gluten free treats for me!

I had the ☕ WORST CUP OF COFFEE from here Today! I am not sure why, but the coffee seemed thicker than normal, it was supposed to be a small medium brew coffee with a shot of sugar-free vanilla, The Taste was absolutely horrible, it left a very bad aftertaste, and I began to feel nauseous while sipping on it, and I just threw it away!

Calm, clean, friendly. There's a lot of places to sit. They make good coffee. Cinnamon French toast latte was my favorite. The matcha frappe was ok wasn't much matcha flavor. Service was great. They have a very large menu of teas and my sister says they do a good job making them.
Always a great joy visiting this coffee shop! Great food, wonderful coffee & lovely staff as a cherry on top!
I've never been in a waterbean I didn't like! Always great services and good coffee and food!
For the price esthetic and area It's an all around great place. I had 2 latteas One hot and one iced.I loved them both. My only complaints are the macarons

I came here pretty frequently while it was still Unwind Coffee and Tea before it was bought by waterbean. I think Unwind had everything nailed. The atmosphere and decor was spot on and perfect. It was cozy and comfy and just overall a great vibe along with fantastic coffee. I was skeptical when Waterbean bought it, but thought I would still try it out. They have completely ruined the warmth in this coffee shop while trying to convert it to a "modern" coffee shop. It's all white and plain. There's no life to the place anymore. It's boring, bland and cold in its style. When I look for a place to spend time I want somewhere inviting and cozy. This place just no longer has that. The way it was when it was "Unwind" was perfect. They captured every aspect of what a coffee shop should be. It's a bummer Waterbean isn't able to hold onto that. On top of that, their coffee is subpar at best and I wish they still had the many tea options as before. It made the place unique. Now it's just another boring chain coffee shop.

The coffee was good but I miss Unwind. Unwind had a ton of tea options and those are gone now. I know Waterbean renovated in Nov, but the atmosphere and furniture are very industrial and not cozy like I would expect for a coffee shop. I got a specialty holiday-themed latte and it was over $6. I've never paid that much for a small latte before. The regular small latte was, I believe, $5.30. I used treat myself to a nice coffee every Sunday, but unfortunately I can't justify spending $6+.
Great place, cool atmosphere. Coffee is pretty good, I told the staff it was my first time & they made a great reccomendation. The food was alright, not the tastiest but decent.

Unwind Tea and coffee, RIP. I'm biased  because I loved the previous establishment, Unwind. This acquisition is so disappointing. The latte came out meh making me want to give up on coffee shops altogether. Place was a little dirty. When i asked for napkins they said they have some and when I looked it was just dirty crumbled napkins left. I said it's empty and when she refilled she put the dirty crumbled napkins on top. It's with a heavy heart that I'm done with this location. Was fun while it lasted.

What a terrible place! They took 30 minutes to take our order. We paid for coffee and breakfast, but the breakfast never showed up. I was so disgusted that we just left.  The two people working were trying their hardest, but it is completely unorganized.  They don't even ask for a name when you order food, so how they know who it's for is beyond me.
A great new addition to the area

Everything is amazing! They are an upscale coffee shop catered to middle/upper class. Their regular cup of tea. 12 OZ is $4. I've never paid so much for a cup of hot water with a little bit of hers in it. The service was amazing! Above and beyond! The place is really cool if you like quiet, modern, clean, peaceful and classy. Not sure how comfortable the chairs are. You'd have to decide on your own.
Clean and nice place, very friendly service.
Loved this place but its currently closed till at least November
I love everything on the food menu. Believe I've tried them  all!!@
Very nice atmosphere, super friendly staff, delicious coffee, and the poppyseed muffin was perfect!
They are closed.
So sad to see this place go! I don't know where to find great loose tea in the Charlotte area.
Friendly staff. Great coffee and food!
Great spot to meet a friend for breakfast or lunch! The chai latte was great and their paninis are delicious.

Amazing little coffee place (with a lot more than coffee!) that offers a relaxed vibe and comfortable atmosphere if you'd like to chill and work, read, or maybe just ponder.  Unwind also has a rather robust and unique menu!  I visit almost daily for a java and some grub, I totally think you should too!
Lovely small cafe. Great staff. A nice experience and place to meet a client for tea.
Nice place to stay, cozy. The staff is very friendly and the place is clean, would recommend

Hands down the best iced lattes in Charlotte, and I've tried A LOT of coffee places. Unwind also has some great food options. My fav is the BLT and my partner likes their Strawberry & Whipped Ricotta Toast. The owner is the sweetest lady and they always have the nicest staff working. Added bonus is they're located in cute, little downtown Pineville!
Love love love this place. Always clean and very pleasant. Coffee is very good and staff is amazing. Location is great as well.
Great and slightly intimidating selection of teas. I love it 🤘🏻

We ordered 3 drinks when it was slower a coffee, matcha, strawberry tea and food. The coffe was good, the matcha was good and the strawberry green tea was brewed correctly and was great! A little later we brought 4 more drinks. 1 tea we threw out immediately after a sip, another we added almost 2 tbs of sugar to improve it...didn't work. 3rd was so bitter it reminded me of wormwood. 4th was so mild in flavor it tasted simply of boiled water. All the last 4 teas tasted really burnt/over brewed and bitter. I guess that since they got busier during the 2nd order they weren't able to deliver the same quality. I expected a consistent good quality for their drinks since that's their specialty so it really threw me off with how the drinks were all over the place. About the food; muffin was great, pizza mid, chicken salad fresh but dry, and the wrap was good. The upside to it all was that the staff were present and the whole cafe was kept clean.
Love this Cafe. The Avocado Tomato Toast on Rosemary Bread is amazing.
This is a nice little place. Excellent food and atmosphere definitely have to stop here again next time I'm in Pineville.
Fresh delicious food. They are doing things right and you get what you pay for here.
Great selection of teas and coffee, along with delicious food.  Very friendly service too.  They often have gluten free pastries and muffins, which makes my husband happy.
Great coffee spot. So good we returned for a second visit! (traveling from out of state)
Cute local coffee shop with a GREAT tea selection!
Great selections of tea, would love to see them have more comfortable seating besides the meatal stools.
I love the bougie latte!
Nice and cozy place

A nice & cozy space! Everything on the menu (especially the specials) sounded so good - it was hard to decide what to get! I unfortunately did not pick a dish that fit my tastes as much as I had hoped, but I'm looking forward to trying something else next time! I also loved that they have a little library nook to find & swap books

DELICIOUS!!!  third time that I've had lunch here - best sandwich and side salad that I remember having - perfect!!  I ordered off the daily special list so I can't remember exactly what it was but it was a grilled whole wheat sandwich.  The dressing was Honey balsamic - YUM!!!! Highly recommend this for lunch:)
Only had time to get a coffee, will go back when have time to check out all the teas they have. Looks like a decent place to meet a friend to enjoy coffee or tea with.

Their chai latte is delicious! I drink chais everywhere, and their chai stands out. Also, the service is wonderful! They're all friendly and helpful. They really really really listen and want to help you. They take their time to explain everything and give you lots of options for what you want. The egg and cheese sandwich is amazing too. They don't save on the ingredients. It's big and filling! And not too salty, as they tend to make it in most places. Thank you!!!

Second time at this charming Tea and Coffee Shop. In the heart of quaint downtown Pineville and offering a wide selection of teas and coffees along with fresh tasty treats and lunchtime bites.  Prompt service with a side of friendly conversation. Limited outdoor seating, but plenty of indoor seating at tables or sofa style.  Will definitely be back!
The food is delicious and the space is very cozy and welcoming!
Great cafe,  we enjoy the selection of fresh tea, coffee is great, French press and vanilla lates are perfect,. Fresh baked goods, delicious salad and sandwiches and more.
Excellent food. Great salads, sandwiches and wraps.  Try the chicken cordon blue wrap.
Good Sandwiches and coffee.  Plenty of table space to work on a laptop.  I wish it was open on Sundays.
What a neat coffee shop and sandwich place.

Set in the heart of downtown Pineville, Unwind tea and coffee has quickly become one of my favorite coffee shops. The teddy bear latte with oat milk is my absolute favorite and every food item I have tried is incredible!

Really nice cafe with lots of space. I wish there were more seating options. The tiny metal bar stools are uncomfortable. Some have a small back and others don't. They have chairs for the short tables, but the chairs are also metal. I met a friend there to work on a project and after sitting for 3 hours (getting up regularly), I still had immense pain in my hip the next day. The food is good as are the coffees. They have a large variety of teas which are competitively priced with other popular coffee houses.

Unwind Tea & Coffee is a true hidden gem and a wonderful place to visit. All of the staff are a pleasure to see and they love being there just spreading kindness and providing phenomenal service. They're located in Historic Downtown Pineville amongst some other locally owned hidden gems. Make it a destination and support local. With tons of parking it's a great quick stop for tea or coffee and they have a variety of delicious bites to eat! It's a perfect setting for one on one networking and business meetings or a chill environment to work a little. With patio seating out front you can people watch and enjoy the charm of the neighborhood. With an amazing selection of the finest teas it's no wonder the connoisseurs flock here for their fill of their favorite selections. If you've never been here…switch up your routine and take a break from the big box stardunks and support local!
Nice relaxing atmosphere with a variety of tea choices as well as coffee.
Nice coffee shop. Great tea selection.
Love it!!

I had a good cappuccino here. I would have liked to stay but the inside was packed with no where to sit. Obviously a popular spot. Only downside is that it took a very very long time to get my drink (20min or so), even though I was the only one waiting at the counter. I'd certainly try them again.
First time visiting. It was great!
Great cup of tea

Found this cute little shop down from the mall. They have a large variety of Tea blends.  Also have Expresso drinks. Nice atmosphere and very Friendly, informative employees. I got a tea blend latte, and some others to brew @ home.🙂

Nice place! Good breakfast flatbread and decent coffee(the aioli tastes like ranch tho, which isn't bad unless you don't like ranch). They took a very long time to get the flatbread out to me. I waited like 25 minutes and it wasn't even that busy. I'd go back but definitely not somewhere to stop if you're in a rush

My MIL, husband and BIL went on a daycation and stopped here. It was lovely. The atmosphere was great and it is a family place. It has games, books, and tea lattes. I am a tea hound and the tea here is extraordinary. They also sell loose leaf too that I highly recommend. If I am ever back here I will come back.
Very nice atmosphere and friendly service great food.
Best tea & coffee place in Pineville

I've been going to this coffee shop for a few years. Long enough for it to have moved to a couple doors down and back to it's original location. I'm a big fan of the cold brew and this last time I had incredible avocado toast. 😍

Mannnnn Charlotte got some excellent coffee shops !!! This is the second one I have been to since visiting this weekend. AMAZING coffee. Like really good! The staff was also so sweet and helpful in helping me decide which latte to choose. I got the Crème Brule!!!! 10/10 recommend
Awesome loose leaf per oz and delicious coffee drinks.

Excellent products and services. They were also very kind and tolerant of my son who has autism. They have a massive selection of premium quality teas that will satisfy those with standard or advanced palates. From a quick latte to a satisfying sandwich, your needs will be met at this location.
My favorite local spot. The staff is always great, the coffee on point, and the food is way better than I anticipated for a "Tea&Coffee" place

It was a nice place, the food was really good portions for the price! I would highly reccomend a sandwich and side salad for the best value. My only issue was I found the wait a bit long, it was around 25 minutes, and it wasn't very busy when I ordered. Despite that it was a good place to grab a bite and the people were very nice.
Nice place and coffee but plz wear masks during this pandemic

What a wonderful gem this shop is! I love sitting in the small downtown atmosphere complete with a railroad track right outside. The coffee is great, and sandwiches are tasty. Everyone here has been extremely helpful and friendly. I haven't tried their tea yet, but highly suggest checking out this adorable spot.

i really love this place! it's really calming to go in there to study, read, or just relax. the staff there are super friendly and the drinks + food are amazing! it has a really nice atmosphere, and it's great to go in the afternoon or morning with friends or even by yourself.
Extensive selection of loose teas, expertly prepared and served coffee and tea, creative and delicious food menu, cozy atmosphere.  On our current list of favorites!
Great place to just relax, pick up a quick nutritional bite or sweet treat and staff is always friendly.
A 👍 spot 4T

It's such a cute and cozy coffee place. It's so quiet and peaceful to work here. Their coffee is very good. They also sell sandwiches and paninis. You can also find many unique flavoured tea from them.

I love the atmosphere! It is very spacious yet cozy at the same time. The food & drink are both delicious. And to top it off there was entertainment! A young lady with an absolutely beautiful voice. This place is a must visit.

Their Wifi password has "2015" in it and I think that's the year they brewed our coffee. The coffee was barely luke-warm and when I asked if it could be heated up they microwaved it in their office for over 5 minutes. Being a trained barista, I was hopeful that request would prompt someone to brew a new batch of coffee; I was mistaken. As I waited for my coffee to be assaulted by the microwave, the manager/owner asked if she could help me. I informed her I was already being helped, but the reason was because the coffee was not hot. Her response: "oh okay." I was appalled. A coffeeshop should never, ever be okay with microwaving someone's coffee. I would rate the coffee a D. Even when it was hot, it wasn't a good flavor. Cleanliness is an A++. Atmosphere is an A, when the staff is quiet. Staff about a B+; they were more concerned with chatting to themselves than helping customers. Overall, I would not recommend this establishment.

My family and I stumbled upon this place and it was absolutely worth it. The chicken sandwich was wonderful and the coffee and tea selections are very unique. Loved the Boujee Cinnamon Latte! Well done! Everyone needs to experience this charming destination with convenient parking
Great Chai tea, excellent atmosphere and staff
50 minutes for a grilled cheese but i ordered a wrap !?!

Omg.. 1st time here today. All of my teas were amazing. And I also tried the soda tea. The atmosphere was very chill. I definitely will be back. And I highly recommend this spot to anyone who love teas.
I buy my loose tea here. It's also a great place to meet friends for tea, coffee or a glass of wine. Friendly, open atmosphere.

Stopped for coffee and a bite to eat based on other google reviews. Beautiful place inside, a little comfy, a little industrial. Very clean. Friendly staff working here. They have loose tea of all kinds and flavors. I got a latte which was perfect (not too hot and not too cool) If you love plants they have some hanging from the ceiling in the cutest hangers. Tables outside on Main St. Free public parking on side street (Dover).

First time here and is an amazing first experience. Upon entering the cafe you already start to feel the nice comfortable home vibes. As you walk in you can smell the spectacular aromas from coffee, tea, and food. The nice chill music playing around the cafe makes the relaxed calming vibe even better. First opinion was the cafe was very clean and covid compliant. So many options for their drinks/food but definitely not overwhelming. I would say the perfect selection for their style here. Decided to try the cold brew for my coffee of choice. The cold brew was a perfect blend, didn't taste watered down like Starbucks gets and was able to enjoy it for the entire time spent at the cafe. Also decided to try the hummus and veggies plate. The hummus was so savory with the oil and pepper blend topping. The veggies tasted just as fresh as they looked. Almost like they were just picked. The decor here definitely  helped with me keep my concentrate while I was working. Loved the wall with different selections of teas. The customer service or should I say guest experience was spectacular, very friendly and nice. Will be a regular spot. Was so pleased about this cafe that I had to write my review on the spot!!
Really good pour over coffee. Good vegan treats. Everyone around me was raving about the food. I just had coffee and treats
Relaxing atmosphere, friendly and welcoming, great coffee and tasty baked goods. I enjoy unwinding here! Thank you.
Love this place, Wendy knew what she was doing when she created this place
Great selection of teas and flavored coffee.  I  didn't get a chance to enjoy their food but from what I saw, it looked delicious
Great little coffee shop lots of chairs and tables. Coffee and food better than average.

I was looking for a local place to buy tea for a friend and found this shop.  They have a pretty big variety of teas with interesting flavors. I'd say there were probably at least 50 choices. I don't like tea, but my friend loved what I got her.  They have some food and prepared drinks as well which we didn't check out.  I'll definitely come back to this place again!
How did I miss this place?
I love the loose leaf tea options. The pastries are delicious.
My new favorite spot in Charlotte! Amazing service, healthy food, and all the tea options imaginable… 💙💙💙💙💙
An amazing place to buy  loose leaf tea  super fresh
Came for coffee and sandwich.  Both were flavorful and fresh!  Excellent staff and service.
Great environment.Loved the coffee!
Friendly atmosphere and pretty good food selections .Parking lot off side street.

A delectable menu of several breakfast items including Avocado toast with bacon, breakfast Flatbread and breakfast sandwich nestled like the gem it is in some wax paper.  The specialty lattes are also amazing
The iced latte was AMAZING. I will be back. Very good espresso
I love this place. The latte's were amazing. Grilled cheese cooked to perfection. I will definitely be back! And the staff were very friendly! 🙌🏾
Great little shop and kind owner. Stools and chairs are a bit hard on the duff, otherwise great staff and snacks.
Amazing!! The best Avocado toast with goat cheese. I could eat it every day!!
Iced Coffee w/ Oatmilk was very good, try the Avocado Toast or the Bacon Egg and Cheese on your favorite bread, lots of Salad and lunch sandwhiches to go with a Tea or Coffee

So I've been here three times now and must say this place is incredible. The tea selection is fabulous and is really the highlight of the whole store. There are probably 100 different teas to go through and smell and enjoy. I also got a panini once and it too was so flipping good. Great business to support!
They know what is a breve cortado 👍
Friendly staff.   Regular stop to my week
Great coffee, fantastic scone and avocado toast was outstanding!

(rereviewing for proper review)  My partner and I went to Unwind as part of our anniversary celebration and were treated with amazing respect by the employees. The atmosphere was amazingly chill, perfect for all types of studying, quiet work sessions or when you just want a nice cup of tea and to read when the day is done.  They have an immaculate tea selection and delicious pour overs and handled out order with the utmost care and kindness even when they had a bit of a line and were super sweet as we left.  We're going to keep coming back to Unwind as we've found one of our favorite places in all of North Carolina.

I can't say enough good things about this place. Wendy and her staff are phenomenal and very pleasant. The atmosphere and food is amazing, ESPECIALLY the breakfast flatbread with salsa. This is a must have!!!  The coffee and incredibly wide selection of teas is also mind blowing. This has become my go to spot in the mornings for my coffee and food fix to start my day off right. Plus it's a privately owned local business.
The coffee and tea were excellent. Staff was not exactly the most customer service friendly but they got the job done. Would definitely return.
Great amount of different tea and spices.
The food fresh and hot, staff was pleasant.
My go to coffeeshop. Cool vibe  and great drinks.
Great spot to chill. Love the decorations and the staff is very friendly

MASKLESS EMPLOYEES. Asked them to put the masks back on, they did it for five seconds until after we ordered food to go and then took them right back off. While we waited, the cashier glared at us a bunch like, “screw you, I do whatever I want.” Overcrowded and no customers were wearing masks, either.
Spacious and friendly coffee and tea cafe' with a large assortment of custom teas and coffees with delicious baked goods—vegan, gluten free, and other. Great service and highly recommended!!
The people are very kind.
I fell in love with this place. The food, coffee, tea and people. Simply lovely.
Friendly staff, great atmosphere, and delicious food and drinks. Love it!

Unwind is one of the few local options where you can still enjoy ☕️+ 🥐 as dine-in — spaced out and with safety measures/distancing in place.  Family-owned café and coffee/tea shop with a rotating breakfast/lunch options. Kid-friendly, free parking nearby and good price value.
Great spot!
Very nice and friendly staff, good coffe and bakery choices
Simply beautiful cafe, good vibes, great collection of teas and a great coffee!
I LOVE the avacado toast so very much...The minestrone soup was amazing and so fresh! The vibe was great, loved it, thank you
Lovely local coffee/tea shop with plenty of loose leaf tea available for purchase. For loose leaf purchases, they offer a loyalty punch card by the ounce.

Just found this place this morning! I am in love! The gingerbread latte and breakfast flatbread were awesome! The atmosphere was quiet and peaceful... the perfect place for me to finish writing my book! I would definitely recommend this place!
Love, love this place!!!!

I loved this place, a lovely afternoon date spot with amazing herbal teas, I recommend the raspberry lemon verbena with one pump of lavender for a lovely sweet tea for any occasion! Truly an awesome establishment

Been here several times. Always great service. Awesome local business with good value and great staff. I really appreciate them addng food and expanding hours. They are a boon to their little corner of the world.
Great environment, friendly owner operated culture!
Beautiful place
This place was awesome! Great atmosphere and my vanilla latte was delicious. The muffins were scrumptious, not overly sweet.

I am SO happy a coworker recommended Unwind! They have become my go to for lunch breaks and I love everything about this little cafe! The inside is super cozy and perfect to get some work done. The staff is always so sweet and helpful! Their food and drinks are always delicious as well! I can't recommend them enough, give them a try if you haven't - you will quickly love them too!!

If you're looking for Loose Leaf Teas, in the Charlotte/Pineville areas, this is the Best Place to go!!! It's Def 1 of my Favorite Places!!! I Love All of the Teas that I've had there already!!! I'm Working on Tasting All of the Teas that they carry, Especially the Chai's!!! The Owner whose name is Wendy, along with her staff are really Friendly, an Knowledgeable about their Teas!!! The Food there is Terrific as well!!! If you go there please tell them that Tom or Joker sent you that way!!!

First time I've been in since the new opening, glad to say nothing has changed except the size :) . Same great choices (more actually)! And as always, friendly, knowledgeable staff. Can not recommend Unwind enough, has been one of my favorites since I moved to the area.
We love Unwind! Our favorite Saturday morning coffee and breakfast spot. We are so thankful to have a great spot close by. Highly recommend the Avocado toast!

Welcoming, spacious coffee shop with an extensive tea and latte menu, plus small plates for breakfast and lunch, as well as evening snacks.  You can also pick up handmade gifts including candles, signs and masks from local artisans.
Great coffee shop
Decent coffee, fast service, nice atmosphere.
Great coffee and great food! We love having this place so close to our home. It's a go to spot every weekend for breakfast. Support local!
Great selection of teas, always great service!!

Great atmosphere and even better food, plus its super convenient from where I live. I recommend the Avocado Tomato Toast that comes with pesto and balsamic drizzle, and if you are up for it, extra red pepper flakes for a kick. Thanks and will definitely be coming back to try more things on the menu.
Coffee was very good when we finally got it. 15 mins. For two drip coffees is not good service in my opinion.
A lovely local coffee and tea shop that is recently remodeled. Ample seating with tables and lounge chairs, friendly staff and delicious assortment to please anyone.

Super cute and local which we love to support.  The sandwiches are really good and the flatbreads look delicious.  Nice coffee and tea selection.  Comfortable seating and fun ambience. I came here with a friend, loved it so much I brought my husband back!  We are Pineville locals and will definitely keep coming back
Had some pleasant surprises on the menu (got the bullet proof coffee). The breakfast sandwich I ordered was very delicious with the rosemary bread being the absolute best part of it.
Unwind is fantastic! Service is great, food is great, and the coffee is by far the best in the charlotte area.
We all enjoyed the tea and great Mango smoothies... Basil enjoyed her time too!💕
Great and quiet coffeehouse in Downtown Pineville.

I have been buying tea from Unwind since 2016. I came across her shop when I lived in North Carolina. I live in Texas now and still order tea from her via the website. Wendy the owner is the sweetest person you will ever meet. She is very knowledgeable about the different types of teas. I am actually drinking one of her teas as I am writing this. I have not been to the new location. However, I do look forward to going when I visit NC again.
Had a delicious black tea and avocado toast this morning! I will definitely be back to try lunch soon ❤🥑
The food and drinks were top notch.  The service was great.  I got take out and the process was easy.  Did I mention the food was great.  Will be going back.
Wendy does an amazing job making coffee and is always kind and joyful! I recommend the coffee and the atmosphere is very peaceful

Fully intended on going here for the first time today but was confused because they're moving to a location two doors down that was closed, but has their sign already up. We were about to walk away when presumably the owner came out and grumbled "can't you read the sign?" and stormed off to the original place. I don't know what was in the coffee she was drinking this morning, but it sure felt bitter. :(
A home grown haven for coffee lovers in a place not otherwise known for good coffee. Skip the Starbucks and come here instead!
Great coffee

We dropped by for first time today (Sat) and had their special latte and Elderberry bomb and it was Good! So many teas to try! Need a whole month of daily visits to try all their teas alone. Small, cozy, worth a visit
Really enjoyed the cozy feel, and the staff was super helpful and very friendly. Great variety of teas, and I'm looking forward to trying more.

Unwind is a great place to sit back and watch the day go by, or catch up with friends and have a great cup of tea or coffee the staff is EXTREMELY knowledge and helpful. The owner is on-site, she will sit and chat with you, without any pressure.
Relaxing tea shop with tastey baked goods.  Great place for a small meeting or work out of the office
Wonderful neighborhood shop. The Chai, Matcha, and custom tea lattes are my favorite. The owners are so friendly and knowledgeable.
Such a great place. Happy. To hear they are expanding their place in February!
Very casual, very quiet - at least on a weekday afternoon. The fresh coffee aroma will seduce you.
This is the only place I can find loose leaf tea!   And they have quite a nice selection.
Unwind has an amazing selection of loose teas and the very friendly staff is quite knowledgeable! They also serve great espresso drinks and yummy pastries!
No stars were deducted.

Most excellent selection — both from an enjoyment and from a wellness standpoint. But it's not just the beverages (or the pumpkin choc chip bread — omg) that keep me coming back. It's the welcoming, positive energy of Wendy (owner) and Sharon (the funny one) and Liam of the Dazzling Smile. Seriously cozy place to enjoy a beverage.
Very chill place and great selection!
Amazing coffee, great tea selection, kind and personable staff. Best place for coffee in Pineville, hands down.
Some of the best loose leaf teas for a reasonable price.
Great place for tea and coffee. The blends she has for coffee have all been impressive.

Thanks to the Google reviews, I finally stopped in after passing by many times. So glad we did!  The staff is so sweet and helpful and the coffee, teas and food from Um's Corner Cafe was delicious. Casual, relaxing Saturday lunch/brunch in a great little spot. Will definitely be back.
Love it
not too bad cappuccino, just about Starbucks - a little overburnt taste. Probably tea (which I saw a good selection) is the speciality of this place, not espresso beverages.
Great, friendly service and great coffee
Quaint local owned coffee shop.  Haven't tried there sandwiches which are only serving during breakfast and lunch.
I've been searching for a decent tea shop for a while. Who knew it'd be 5 miles away?  A wide variety of loose leaf tea selections. Chic farm style atmosphere
Really great selection of loose leaf tea and brewing accessories.
Nice coffee place and yummy food being served.
Friendly, quiet and inviting!  Love the selection of loose teas and local gifts.
it's killing me inside that I can't recreate the taste of her iced latte's, but it's probably saving me from getting diabetes that I can only get them from her 😂

Perfect place for tea or coffee.. feel like family when u walk in..very knowledgeable on the products they sell..can order you what ever tea u looking for or help u find it...u need to check it out, I found it by mistake and happy I did.
Great selection of beverages and friendly and informative staff
Fresh ground espresso added to flavorful chai. Wonderful ambiance, pleasant staff, and a great experience. Couldn't ask for anything more.

This place is wonderful! Small cozy little coffee and tea place. Not to mention the coffee is absolutely amazing. The lovely lady at the desk was extremely helpful and kind. 10 out of 10 will definitely be back and will be bringing family as well.

First time trying Unwind tea & coffee even though we only live a few blocks away. Their  cold brew caramel latte and cold brew caramel coffees are insanely good. Will definitely be going back sooner rather than later.
Great place to have tea, coffee, pastry and good conversation.
Very nice place to relax and sip on some awesome tea or coffee.
great place for different varieties of teas
Good stuff fair prices

Wonderful hostess/owner who brews each cup of coffee to order in a French press. She will even make you a "bullet proof" coffee with butter!  Unwind has a variety in types of coffee and especially teas. There are treats to go along with the drinks. Unwind!

We spent probably almost an hour on our first trip to Unwind - for a smaller space, there's seriously so much to check out! Such a nice, comfortable, calming feel to the store. And - the tea is amazing! One of the only places to get loose leaf in Charlotte.
Awesome place! Great Tea!
Best tea shop in town.
I love this place! The owner is very sweet, welcoming and knowledgeable. I highly recommend others to stop by and check out the large selection of available teas.
Charming. Good service. Plenty of menu options for their market: coffee and tea.
Absolutely love this little place.  Great teas, coffees, gifts and people
Great tea, so good.
Good coffee and tea
Great service will be back soon!
Highly recommended! Great selection of teas and very welcoming.
You have to go here - great loose teas and coffee drinks! Cool arts consignment also!
Friendly service, cheap drink prices, and loose leaf tea for sale.  We will definitely be back soon!
Love the variety and quality of the read and coffee. Wendy is awesome!

This was my first time at this tea shop ,and I absolutely loved it !!!! There was an amazing selection of tea's , and I loved how you could pick them up and smell them your self with out having to ask some one to get it from behind a counter to let you sniff . And the prices are amazing!  Such a cute place . I will deffently be going back for more tea . I got three black tea's and one white tea . I can't wait to take my friends here !
I love this store!!! The tea selection is great. I love being able to pick exactly what tea I want to drink on the go. The owner is so nice. The other merchandise they sell is beautiful

After passing by this place a couple of times I decided to finally go in and oh boy do I wish I had come in here sooner. Both my coffee and tea were excellent. Tons of options to select from. Incredibly kind and wonderful service. Will definitely be coming back and I highly recommend giving this place a shot.
Great place to get many different teas and coffees.
Large selection of Teas......great gifts, great ambiance, Owner is very Kind !
Great selection, great service, and great atmosphere. Both the beverage dilettante and the experienced brewer will find their needs met here.

Great atmosphere, very warm and welcoming. There is a large selection of loose leaf teas, as well as coffee; take home a bag of loose leaf tea or take a cup to-go. The owner also supports local artisans and has their work available to purchase in the shop. This is a wonderful place that has only been open for about a year. I recommend all tea-lovers to give this cute little place some love.
